devdoc.author: SIGH Finance
devdoc.details: Implementation of the $SIGH Liquidity & Borrowing Streams for ITokens.

allowBorrowingSIGHRedirectionTo(address,.details: gives allowance to an address to execute the Borrowing $SIGH Stream redirection on behalf of the caller.

params._to: the address to which the Borrowing $SIGH Stream redirection permission is given. Pass address(0) to reset the allowance.*

allowLiquiditySIGHRedirectionTo(address,.details: gives allowance to an address to execute the Liquidity $SIGH Stream redirection on behalf of the caller.

params._to: the address to which the Liquidity $SIGH Stream redirection permission is given. Pass address(0) to reset the allowance.*

redirectBorrowingSIGHStream(address,addr.details: redirects the Borrowing $SIGH Stream being generated to a target address.

params._to: the address to which the Borrowing $SIGH Stream will be redirected*

redirectBorrowingSIGHStreamOf(address,ad.details: redirects the Borrowing $SIGH Stream generated by _from to a target address. The caller needs to have allowance on the Borrowing $SIGH Stream redirection to be able to execute the function.

params._from: the address of the user whom Borrowing $SIGH Stream is being redirected
params._to: the address to which the Borrowing $SIGH Stream will be redirected*

redirectLiquiditySIGHStream(address,addr.details: redirects the Liquidity $SIGH Stream being generated to a target address.

params._to: the address to which the Liquidity $SIGH Stream will be redirected*

redirectLiquiditySIGHStreamOf(address,ad.details: redirects the Liquidity $SIGH Stream generated by _from to a target address. The caller needs to have allowance on the Liquidity $SIGH Stream redirection to be able to execute the function.

params._from: the address of the user whom Liquidity $SIGH Stream is being redirected
params._to: the address to which the Liquidity $SIGH Stream will be redirected*

updateRedirectedBalanceOfBorrowingSIGHSt.details: Updates the Borrowing $SIGH Stream Redirected Balances of the user. If the user is not redirecting anything, nothing is executed.

params._balanceToAdd: the amount to add to the redirected balance
params._balanceToRemove: the amount to remove from the redirected balance*
params._user: the address of the user for which the some change in the Liquidity is happening

updateRedirectedBalanceOfLiquiditySIGHSt.details: Updates the Liquidity $SIGH Stream Redirected Balances of the user. If the user is not redirecting anything, nothing is executed.

params._balanceToAdd: the amount to add to the redirected balance
params._balanceToRemove: the amount to remove from the redirected balance*
params._user: the address of the user for which the some change in the Liquidity is happening

devdoc.title: $SIGH STREAMS
